tool.name: OGS: CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines'.

param.name: gml
param.label: gml
param.help: Write found nodes to gml file.

param.name: output_base_file_name
param.label: output base file name
param.help: the base the file the output (geometry (gli) and boundary condition (bc)) will be written to

param.name: type
param.label: type
param.help: the process type the boundary condition will be written for currently LIQUID_FLOW (primary variable PRESSURE1) and GROUNDWATER_FLOW (primary variable HEAD, default) are supported

param.name: search_length
param.label: search length
param.help: The size of the search length. The default value is std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon()

param.name: input_geometry
param.label: input geometry
param.help: the file containing the input geometry

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: the path to the gmsh binary

tool.help: This tool runs the **CreateBoundaryConditionsAlongPolylines** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
